original_text: God does speak to people. He speaks to them in many different ways. But often people do not recognize his voice. God does speak to people. He speaks to them in many different ways. But often people do not recognize his voice. God does speak to people.
korean_text: 하나님은 한 번 말씀하시고 다시 말씀하시되 사람은 관심이 없도다

sentences.original_text: He speaks to them in many different ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러 가지 다른 방법으로 그들에게 말씀하신다

sentences.original_text: But often people do not recognize his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람들은 종종 그의 음성을 알아차리지 못한다

sentences.original_text: He speaks to them in many different ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러 가지 다른 방법으로 그들에게 말씀하신다

sentences.original_text: But often people do not recognize his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람들은 종종 그의 음성을 알아차리지 못한다
